meanings.sent1: The overtight rope snapped under the pressure.
meanings.sent2: She wore an overtight dress that was uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The overtight shoelaces made him trip comically.
meanings.sent4: The overtight grip on the steering wheel showed her nervousness.
meanings.sent5: The overtight knot was impossible to undo.

meanings.sent1: He overtightened the screws and stripped them.
meanings.sent2: She tends to overtighten the jar lids, making them hard to open.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally overtightened the belt, causing his pants to fall down.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic warned not to overtighten the bolts to avoid damage.
meanings.sent5: She had to overtighten the clamp to secure the pipe.

meanings.sent1: The overtight jeans were cutting off circulation.
meanings.sent2: The overtight budget left no room for unexpected expenses.
meanings.sent3: The overtight lid on the jar made it impossible to open.
meanings.sent4: The overtight embrace made her feel claustrophobic.
meanings.sent5: The overtight grip on the door handle showed his anxiety.
